resources.string: Kåfjord is an app developed to simply gather information about the summer house and the surrounding area.\n\n

1. When entering you will find light switches on the left hand. By switching on the top switch you will turn on the floor heat.

 2. Further down the hallway, on the left by the kitchen, you will find the ventilation panel. Turn the ventilation up to three.

 3. Here you will also find a panel to turn on the water. Turn on the water.

1. Before leaving turn off the top switch by the entrance door to lower the floor heat.

 2. Turn down the ventilation to one.

 3. Turn off the water.

 4. Vacuum the summer house and clean the bathrooms.

 5. Put everything you used back where you found it.
